original_text: On the 15th day of the eighth month, Jeroboam offered sacrifices on the altar that he had made at Bethel. That was the special day that he himself had decided to choose as a festival for the Israelites. On that day, he burned incense on the altar.
korean_text: 그가 자기 마음대로 정한 달 곧 여덟째 달 열다섯째 날로 이스라엘 자손을 위하여 절기로 정하고 벧엘에 쌓은 제단에 올라가서 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: On the 15th day of the eighth month
Jeroboam offered sacrifices on the altar
that he had made at Bethel
that he himself had decided to choose
as a festival for the Israelites
he burned incense on the altar
